halawatha muhudu weralehi randi siti tharuna yuwalaka biya ganwa owungen rupiyal dedahasaka kappam mudalak labaganimata thath kirime siddhiye sakakara polis kosthapalwarun dedenage wada wahama kriyathmaka wana ayurin thahanam kala bawa halawatha mulasthana polisiya kiyayi.halawatha sahakara polis adhikari es.pi.sandanayaka mahathage niyogayen wada thahanamkara aththe halawatha polisiyata anuyuktha sthira sewa polis kosthapal wedagedara indika amal kumara 50370 aadhunika polis kosthapal dilipa eranga sirisena 83205 namathi dedenayi.me dedena halawatha muhudu weralata pamina sada suwa windimin siti tharuna yuwalak athadanguwata ganna bawata tharjanaya kara biya ganwa rupiyal dedahasaka kappam mudalak illime chodanawa matha athadanguwata gena thibuni.
